mapper.select: select count(*) from t_history where warehouse_name=#{warehouse_name} and history_state='enable' and history_date like #{stock_month}||'%'
select count(*) from t_monthly_stock where stock_month = #{stock_month} and warehouse_name = #{warehouse_name}
mapper.update: update t_history set history_state='disable' where warehouse_name=#{warehouse_name} and history_state='enable' and history_date like #{stock_month}||'%'
mapper.select: select * from t_stock where warehouse_name=#{warehouse_name} and stock_quantity_40kg!=0 order by stock_year, stock_sort1, stock_sort2, to_number(stock_unit)
mapper.delete: delete from t_monthly_stock where stock_month = #{stock_month} and warehouse_name = #{warehouse_name}

insert.foreach: INTO t_monthly_stock (stock_month, stock_seq_num, warehouse_name, stock_year, stock_sort1, stock_sort2, stock_unit, stock_quantity_40kg) VALUES(#{stock_month}, #{item.stock_seq_num}, #{item.warehouse_name}, #{item.stock_year}, #{item.stock_sort1}, #{item.stock_sort2}, #{item.stock_unit}, #{item.stock_quantity_40kg})

mapper.select: select * from t_history where history_date like #{stock_month} || '%' and warehouse_name = #{warehouse_name} order by stock_year,stock_sort1,stock_sort2,to_number(stock_unit), to_date(history_date,'yyyy-mm-dd')
